original: Lundstedt, Sven Gustaf Gereon, stationsinspektor, Falköping, f. 10/10/ 87 i Sthlm av tågmäst. Gustaf L. o. Emma Damm. G. 14 m. Helfrid Nilsson. Barn: Sven-Olov f. 15, Sven-Erik 20, Britta 24. — Mog:ex. v. södra latin i Sthlm 06, h. trafikkurs 21. Anst. v. SJ sed. 06, e. o. stat:skriv. i Flen o. Stadsgården i Sthlm 08-10, ord. i Hal sberg o. Flen 10-18 bokhå l. i järnv :styr. 18-22, förste slat:skriv. i Ånge 22-30, stat:insp. i Hoting 30-32, i Lerum 32-33, byråassist. i Boden 33-40, stat:insp. i Kil 40-43, i Falköp. sed. 43. Tf. omb:man i Västergötl. turist-trafikfören. fr. 47. Hobby: friluftsliv, spec. skidåkn. GMnr, ÖRKHt, Skid-o. friluftsfrämj. SM.
translated: Lundstedt, Sven Gustaf Gereon, Station Inspector, Falköping, b. 10/10/87 in Stockholm to Train Master Gustaf L. and Emma Damm. Married on the 14th to Helfrid Nilsson. Children: Sven-Olov b. 15, Sven-Erik b. 20, Britta b. 24. Completed middle school at the Southern Latin School in Stockholm in 1906, completed traffic training in 1921. Employed by SJ since 1906, acting civil servant in Flen and Stadsgården in Stockholm from 1908-1910, regular civil servant in Halsberg and Flen from 1910-1918 as an accountant in the railroad administration. From 1918-1922, first-level clerk in Ånge, from 1930-1932, state inspector in Hoting, from 1932-1933, state inspector in Lerum, from 1933-1940, bureau assistant in Boden, from 1940-1943, state inspector in Kil, since 1943 in Falköping. Acting representative for the West Gothia Tourist Traffic Association from 1947. Hobby: outdoor activities, especially skiing. GMnr (Military Merit Number), ÖRKHt (Royal Order of His Majesty the King), Ski and Outdoor Recreation Promotion National Champion.

awards.name: Royal Order of His Majesty the King
Ski and Outdoor Recreation Promotion National Championship
